scripts.dev:backend: node -e "const {spawn} = require('child_process'); const {existsSync} = require('fs'); const {join} = require('path'); const cwd = join(__dirname, 'backend'); const python = process.platform === 'win32' ? join(cwd, 'venv/Scripts/python.exe') : join(cwd, 'venv/bin/python'); const cmd = existsSync(python) ? python : (process.platform === 'win32' ? 'py' : 'python3'); spawn(cmd, ['server.py'], {cwd, stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && (py -m venv venv 2>nul || python3 -m venv venv || python -m venv venv) && (py -m pip install --upgrade pip || python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip || python -m pip install --upgrade pip) && (py -m pip install -r requirements.txt || python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt)
scripts.setup: pnpm run install:frontend && pnpm run install:backend
